atomic_tests.name: Detect a Debugger Presence in the Machine
atomic_tests.description: Detecting a running debugger process or if the debugger is attached to a process via PowerShell

executor.name: powershell
executor.procedure:
# Check for common debugger processes
$debuggerProcesses = Get-Process | Where-Object { $_.ProcessName -match "dbg" -or $_.ProcessName -match "debug" }
# Check for debugging flags
$debuggingFlags = [System.Diagnostics.Debugger]::IsAttached
